# Get Movies by Genre

This endpoint retrieves a list of movies based on the specified genre.

## Request

### Endpoint

`GET /ntuaflix_api/bygenre`

### Query Parameters

- `qgenre` (optional, string): The genre for filtering the movies.
- `minrating` (optional, string): The minimum rating for filtering the movies.
    

## Response

- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
    

### Data Fields

- `endYear` (string): The end year of the movie.
- `genres` (array of strings): The genres associated with the movie.
- `originalTitle` (string): The original title of the movie.
- `principals` (array of objects):
    - `category` (string): The category of the principal.
    - `name` (string): The name of the principal.
    - `nameID` (string): The ID of the principal.
- `rating` (object):
    - `avrating` (number): The average rating of the movie.
    - `nvotes` (string): The number of votes.
- `startYear` (string): The start year of the movie.
- `titleAkas` (array of objects):
    - `akatitle` (string): The alternative title of the movie.
    - `regionAbbrev` (string): The region abbreviation.
- `titleID` (string): The ID of the movie title.
- `titlePoster` (string): The URL of the movie poster.
- `type` (string): The type of the movie.

# Get Movie Details by Title ID

This endpoint retrieves the details of a movie based on its title ID.

## Request

### Endpoint

`GET http://localhost:9876/ntuaflix_api/title/tt0000929`

## Response

- Status: 200
- Content-Type: application/json
    

``` json

    {
      "akatitle": "",

    }

}

 ```
